itinerary.mapNote: High mountain hut below Triglav summit. 2401m.

itinerary.overnight: Koča pri Triglavskih jezerih (Seven Lakes Hut)
itinerary.mapNote: Summit Triglav 2864m, descend through Seven Triglav Lakes. 1685m.
Slovenia's largest natural lake. Trail end. 526m.

waypoints.name: Triglav Summit
waypoints.note: Slovenia's highest peak and national symbol. Summit cross since 1778.

waypoints.name: Seven Triglav Lakes
waypoints.note: Seven glacial tarns in a valley. Most scenic section of circuit.

waypoints.name: Triglavski Dom Hut
waypoints.note: Highest staffed mountain hut in Slovenia. Below summit crags.

waypoints.name: Lake Bohinj
waypoints.note: Slovenia's largest natural lake. Triglav views. Trail end.

waypoints.name: Aljaž Tower
waypoints.note: Tiny iron shelter on Triglav summit. Symbol of Slovenian identity.
